citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
On 03/10/14 at 11:30 am the licensee failed to have a responsible adult available in order that an Animal Welfare
Inspection could be performed.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
